column2: Purpose Of this Role: The role aims at setting up and running innovation based research and gathering Market Intelligence to facilitate management decision making. column2: We are seeking a talented and dedicated Product Designer to join the Product Attribute Management product team     This team is responsible for the end-to-end software development lifecycle, from requirements gathering to production support     The ideal candidate will have a served as a Business Analyst or Product Designer in a previous role, with experience in bridging the gap between business and technology, documenting requirements, designing new products, and establishing/improving KPIs           Required Skills/Experience:        Bachelor s degree in computer science, computer engineering, IT, or equivalent.     3+ years of experience in gathering and analyzing requirements and designing software prototypes to support product development.      Ability to synthesize and visualize complex, ambiguous, or even conflicting concepts and translate them into a list of use-cases or data attributes, or an action plan for the team or organization.      Excellent interpersonal and communication skills and demonstrated ability to work cross-functionally, building trust and driving success across skill teams (business and product) and leadership levels.     Ability to convey design requirements and specification details to the team.     Ability to communicate how design incorporates both customer and business value.     Ability to facilitate discussions, including agile ceremonies.     Strong desire to learn new things.     Willing to work on a highly collaborative team fulfilling different roles and fill gaps.     High degree of initiative, self-motivation, and ability to work autonomously.     Experience working with Agile project management software such Jira or Rally.     Good organizational and time management skills.       This individual will:        Collaborate with business team to define capabilities and use-cases that meet regulatory requirements. Engage with the Product Owner and team to define product strategy and roadmap for implementation. Collaborate with internal and external technical peers (Product Managers, Enterprise Architects and Software Engineers) to design and validate technical approaches and designs. Develop relationships and maintain a knowledge of the ecosystem.     Create wireframes, mockups, and prototypes to visualize and communicate product design concepts and interactions.      Advocate for the user throughout the product development lifecycle and champion a user-centered design approach within the organization.     Collaborate with team in design, development, and maintenance of production application. Assist in estimation, systems testing, triage and debugging.     Clearly communicate product roadmap to cross functional teams and stakeholders to gain alignment. Grow subject matter expertise, provide guidance to other members on the team and detail our capabilities to help educate partners.      Evaluate emerging industry trends and technologies, including AI/ML. Identify opportunities for business process and technology improvements through user research, usability testing, and business analysis.     Participate in Daily Standups, Story Mapping, Iteration Planning Meetings and Retrospectives. Create and prioritize a backlog to help build new features with required definition of ready and done. Partner with Product Owners and software engineers and as required execute test scenarios at various levels (functional, user acceptance) within Agile Framework.
column11: Business process, Production support, Business analysis, Debugging, Agile, Test scenarios, Product design, JIRA, Usability testing

column2: Role: As the AI/ML Product Owner and Application-focused Product Owner, you will lead separate sprint planning and execution, ensuring the successful delivery of AI/ML and application-focused projects. Responsibilities:  Collaborate with stakeholders to define project objectives, priorities, and requirements.  Lead sprint planning sessions and coordinate with cross-functional teams to execute project deliverables.  Monitor project progress and address any issues or obstacles that arise.  Act as the primary point of contact for project-related inquiries and updates.  Ensure alignment between project outcomes and business goals. Qualifications:  Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Business Administration, or related field.  Proven experience in product ownership or project management roles.  Strong understanding of agile methodologies and sprint planning processes.  Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.  Ability to prioritize and manage multiple projects simultaneously.

column2: We are looking for an experienced product management leader to develop and train a product management team to ensure they complete product initiatives across the company.      You will be closely partnering with other product leaders to drive the success of various Brightly product lines.      In this role, you will work with engineering, product, sales, marketing, and clients on very high-importance, cross-functional analytical and strategic projects to ensure alignment of our overall product vision, product development, and ultimately, our go-to-market strategies.      You will be doing this while keeping in mind customer needs, satisfaction, and adoption.      Ideal candidates have a strong foundational background in modern Product Management practices and intuition and an understanding of what makes an enterprise software business successful.          What you'll be doing             Foster a strong agile subject area and inspire teams to continuously improve product management practices.      Partner with leaders and team members to drive alignment, secure resources and overcome impediments.      Promote a culture anchored in data and encourage the use of data to validate outcomes, drive insights and lead the business tactically and strategically      Attract, grow and empower top product talent      Partner closely with other Product Management Leaders to understand and communicate the business goals, product strategy and industry trends to the team      Educate and coach the team on product management standard processes      Represent product management on the leadership team and identify ways to improve engagement and employee satisfaction      Partner with Technology leaders on end-state architecture to drive performance and scalable technology solutions that solve client and business problems       What you need             The successful candidate will possess 15+ years minimum of product management experience on an Enterprise SaaS solution, platform, marketplace, or other software-led product in an agile B2B environment, and 8+ years in a leadership role              Comfortable navigating the big picture and executional realities      Willing to make commitments and trade-offs with other leaders to remove impediments for your team      Experience influencing leadership, as well as navigating conversations with peers      Comfortable with friction and not afraid to make hard, sometimes unpopular decisions      Thrives in ambiguous situations, motivated by the opportunity to work with teams to define a clear course of action      Compassionate leader with demonstrated success building and mentoring a product team      Superb communication skills for both oral and written communication; ability to communicate confidently across all levels in the organization.      Biased toward action and comfortable working in a fast-paced environment      Good to have knowledge on Product Designing      Bachelors Degree          Behavioral Competencies         Entrepreneurial: High energy level, sense of urgency and intellectual curiosity, confident, thorough, not afraid to make decisions, oriented toward practical solutions. Passion for developing great products!      Self-confidence: Confident, without an ego, to have both the conviction and willingness to make decisions as well as the confidence to seek collaborative solutions      Strong work ethic: Ability to overcome setbacks and enthusiastically persist until bold goals are achieved must be resourceful, creative and innovative.      Accountable: Results-oriented team player who leads by example, holds self-accountable for performance, takes ownership, champions efforts with enthusiasm and conviction.      Great attitude: Scrappy, resourceful, collaborative, adaptable, fun, solid sense of humor and able to influence others
column11: Product management, Trade, Analytical, Agile, Product sales, Product design, Technology solutions, Enterprise software, Product strategy

column2: Role Overview: We are seeking a dynamic and experienced Head of Product with HRC Labs to drive the development and implementation of our RCM product portfolio.  The ideal candidate will have extensive experience in US Healthcare RCM products, preferably with a background in a similar role within an RCM organization, and a proven track record of delivering successful product strategies.  The role will require to take the product solutions to RCM clients (existing and new) showcasing the benefits and functionalities to deliver increased business. This role requires working closely in partnership with the Sales leaders to deliver our Products-related Revenue targets.   Key Responsibilities: Drive product adoption and growth through effective go-to-market strategies, pricing models, and sales enablement initiatives. Lead the product vision, strategy, and roadmap for HRC Labs, aligning with company objectives and market demands. Conduct market research and competitive analysis to identify trends, opportunities, and threats in the RCM space. Drive the end-to-end product lifecycle, from ideation to launch, ensuring timely delivery of high-quality solutions. Creativity and innovation in applying AI solutions to business challenges. Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams including engineering, design, sales, marketing, and operations to execute product initiatives effectively. Define and prioritize features based on customer feedback, user research, and data-driven insights. Understand the US healthcare market, customer needs, and competitive landscape to identify opportunities for innovation Prioritize features and tasks for the product using customer feedback, business strategy, and market research Develop strong relationships with key stakeholders, including clients, partners, and industry experts, to gather insights and validate product direction Strategic thinker with the ability to execute on priorities Experience with user interface design and improving user experience. Establish metrics and KPIs to measure product performance, track progress, and drive continuous improvement Collaborate closely with the sales team to identify client needs and market opportunities Set and achieve sales targets, working closely with the sales head to align product and sales strategies. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Business, Computer Science, Engineering, or related field; MBA or advanced degree is a plus. Minimum 15 years of experience in product management, with at least 10 years experience of front-ending discussions with clients to showcase RCM Product capabilities and solutions. Proven track record of successfully launching and scaling software products, preferably in the healthcare industry. Hands-on experience with latest AI applications & automation technology, and familiarity with cloud services and deploying AI solutions at scale. Deep understanding of RCM processes, regulations, and industry best practices. Experience working with one of the large RCM organizations is highly desirable. Strong analytical skills with the ability to translate complex data into actionable insights. Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to influence and inspire cross-functional teams. Strategic thinker with a customer-centric mindset and a passion for innovation. Proven leadership skills with the ability to mentor and develop a high-performing team. Shift:  Flexible to provide coverage in US morning window
column11: Automation, Artificial Intelligence, RCM

column2: Project Role : Product Designer Project Role Description : Conceptualize, design and prototype innovative digital or physical products. Develop physical, 2D/3D, immersive prototypes and videos for products. Refine product design through iterative user testing documenting and applying feedback on functionality and usability. Must have skills : Oracle Utilities Customer Care & Billing SPL Good to have skills : NA Minimum  2  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : 15 years plus full time education Summary :As a Product Designer, you will be responsible for conceptualizing, designing, and prototyping innovative digital or physical products. Your typical day will involve developing physical, 2D/3D, immersive prototypes and videos for products, refining product design through iterative user testing, and documenting and applying feedback on functionality and usability.  Roles & Responsibilities: Lead the design and development of innovative digital or physical products using Oracle Utilities Customer Care & Billing SPL. Create physical, 2D/3D, immersive prototypes and videos for products. Refine product design through iterative user testing, documenting and applying feedback on functionality and usability. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product managers, engineers, and designers, to ensure product design aligns with business objectives and user needs. Professional & Technical Skills: Must To Have Skills:Experience with Oracle Utilities Customer Care & Billing SPL. Good To Have Skills:Experience with other product design tools and technologies. Strong understanding of user-centered design principles and practices. Experience with prototyping and user testing methodologies. Excellent communication and collaboration skills. Additional Information: The candidate should have a minimum of 2 years of experience in Oracle Utilities Customer Care & Billing SPL. The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in product design, industrial design, or a related field, along with a proven track record of delivering impactful product design solutions. This position is based at our Gurugram office.Educational Qualification:15 years plus full time education Qualification 15 years plus full time education

column2: Responsibilities (Other duties may be assigned.) Provide technical and people leadership across a multi-functional team, ensuring readiness of all aspects of our software releases in line with the SDLC process and against our internal standards. Leading and managing the team, constantly improving the team working practices and providing feedback Mentoring and coaching team members, including goal setting. Facilitate internal communication and effective collaboration. Be the point of contact for external communications (e.g., from customers or stakeholders) Work with product owners to handle backlogs and new requests. Resolve conflicts and remove obstacles that occur. Ensure deliverables are up to quality standards. Help build a productive environment where team members own??the product and enjoy working on it. Although this is intended as a full-time Scrum Master role, your willingness and ability to engage hands-on in work within the team will be great asset. Ability to identify, deliver and drive improvements and innovations within Product Engineering. Education and/or Experience Degree in Computer Science, Business or similar field Experience in a scrum master role Line Management Experience including performance appraisals of direct reports. Certified SCRUM Master Evidence of successfully leading and delivering medium and large projects using agile techniques Excellent knowledge of Scrum techniques and artifacts (such as definition of done, user stories, automated testing, backlog refinement) Knowledge, Skills and Abilities Good knowledge of other Agile frameworks (SAF(e)) Excellent communication and leadership skills Problem-solving and conflict-resolution ability Outstanding organizational skills Understanding of Continuous Integration and release cycle patterns Technical Skills Software delivery, design, development or testing background in Java technologies and enterprise web applications areas will be an asset.

column2: Zycus is looking for candidates with excellent knowledge in software  Product Management  & consumer products with ?a Master's in Business Administration from Premium B - schools (Tier 1 Only) Director Product Management  will play a critical role in owning the entire product life Cycle, right from planning to execution.? Eager beaver attitude and an obsession with deadlines, analysis of the product performance, driving a solution set across development teams and a visionary will be the drivers for this role. The selected candidate will be responsible for creating world class products, driving teams in improving customer adoption and satisfaction and has the complete ownership of the product roadmap and development plans. At Zycus, we strongly believe only an empowered Product Management Team can take a product forward and so we entrust our Product Managers to take all the product related decisions. We treat the product managers as CEOs for their products, and product managers are evaluated on the product's commercial success. Also, product managers are our evangelists - they are responsible for articulating the product's vision to customers, partners, analysts and internal stakeholders like sales, presales and implementation teams. Role & responsibilities     Development & implementation strategies that help in the product growth? Identifying new opportunities maximize new revenue & meet renewal targets Strong understanding of recent & emerging IT trends and technical architecture Gathering business requirements and creating the functional spec Interacting with users, performing market research, and developing the products Product Strategy & vision Monitoring the development & QA teams Laying out the web, Mobile (iOS, Android) strategy and roadmap Multi functional team collaboration to understand and prioritize requirements Prioritize Feature requirements Conceptualization and detailed wire framing / Prototyping Managing the entire release management process Writing user stories and grooming those with design and engineering teams Agile Product Implementation Managing the entire release management process Product Marketing  : Evangelizing , influencing and collaborating with the product marketing and communications team to ensure proper, informative, impacting engagement with the market through branding, blogs, e-mailers and white papers. Go-to-Market: Conducting feature training and demo sessions with sales and support teams. Collaborating with product marketing and communication team for branding, blogs and product launches. Preferred candidate profile     Ability to handle ambiguity and change Very strong logical thinking capabilities and analytical skills Visualize and conceptualize new ideas and solutions UI designing & prototyping ( use of wire framing tools) Research and analysis (both primary and secondary research) Customer management and excellent communication & presentation skills Art of negotiation and prioritization Ability to manage teams and built close relationships with different team members. Visionary ? Desired Experience: Total experience:  Minimum 10 yrs of relevant Product Management Experience in Saas / Enterprise Product Management post full time MBA from Tier 1 B- School only Background in Product management / Product Design. Visualize and Conceptualize ideas/ features. Ability to present new ideas in any format of choice (PPT / Wireframe , etc) Ability to adopt process approach to solve a problem Strong appreciation to technology Excellent communication and high on aptitude. Driving various teams to success. Perks and benefits    Five Reasons Why You Should Join Zycus Cloud Product Company: We are a Cloud SaaS Company and our ?products are created by using the latest technologies like ML and AI. ?Our UI is in Angular JS and we are developing our mobile apps using ?React. A Market Leader: Zycus is recognized by Gartner (worlds ?leading market research analyst) as a Leader in Procurement Software ?Suites. Move between Roles: We believe that change leads to ?growth and therefore we allow our employees to shift careers and move to ?different roles and functions within the organization Get a Global Exposure: You get to work and deal with our global customers. Create ?an Impact: Zycus gives you the environment to create an impact on the ?product and transform your ideas into reality. Even our junior engineers ?get the opportunity to work on different product features. About Us Zycus is a pioneer in Cognitive Procurement software and has been a ?trusted partner of choice for large global enterprises for two decades. ?Zycus has been consistently recognized by Gartner, Forrester, and other ?analysts for its Source to Pay integrated suite. Zycus powers its S2P ?software with the revolutionary Merlin AI Suite. Merlin AI takes over ?the tactical tasks and empowers procurement and AP officers to focus on ?strategic projects; offers data-driven actionable insights for quicker ?and smarter decisions, and its conversational AI offers a B2C type ?user-experience to the end-users. Zycus helps enterprises drive real savings, reduce risks, and boost ?compliance, and its seamless, intuitive, and easy-to-use user interface ?ensures high adoption and value across the organization.

column2: Drive strategic innovation to generate new product ideas to build-on/ enhance the product core.          Gather insights and conduct extensive research to identify gaps / opportunities in existing products.          Validate early product ideas in conjunction with business, marketing & technology teams          Evaluate and identify improvement areas with respect to processes, customer acquisition, behaviour and retention strategies          Manage all aspects of the product lifecycle, including problem definition, product strategy/roadmap, creating product documents, customer needs, and use case definition.          Work closely with the UI/UX design team to ensure the product vision is suitably accomplished.          In a consumer centric product, having a closed loop mechanism is imperative and therefore one of the key responsibilities would be to conduct usability studies across defined personas to understand how customers are interacting with the product and develop enhancements based on the results/analysis          Product management is a continuous task and therefore it will be key to continuously improve existing products and features to drive higher conversion or engagement.          Internalize and deeply understand the companys mission and strategies, as well as the mission and objectives of your specific team.          Construct the release process and coordinating and prioritising activities required to bring the product to market. This involves bridging gaps between different functions within the company and aligning the teams involved.          Strong appetite to understand and research the moving / evolving landscape of the consumer internet industry in India including competition.          Must Have:          To be successful in this role, the ideal candidate must have          Self-confidence, dynamism, and a belief in challenging self          A minimum of 2 years of business analyst / product management experience in a Consumer Internet set-up. Exposure to online discovery platforms and/or e-commerce websites would be preferred.          Relevant experience should include being part of technology build operations.          Excellent problem-solving, organizational and analytical skills, with the ability to evolve product strategy based on research, data and industry trends and crystalize creative ideas into timebound tangible steps that can feed into product go/no-go decision matrix.          Analytical, evaluative, and problem-solving abilities. Drive to apply yourself.          Passion for Results: High degree of commitment with bias for execution excellence.          Keeping up-to-date with the latest technologies          Tech background is preferred with a good understanding of data, metrics and building models.          Product grasp - capable of taking business metrics, breaking them into investment areas, and leading thought in these areas.          Practical knowledge and understanding of Mobile and Web applications.          Last but not the least, An avid / extensive APP user

column1: AVP/ SPM/ Leader - Product Management (B2B Marketplace/ Ecommerce)
column2: Join the IndiaMART's product management team as a VP/ AVP/ SPM in a dynamic and impactful role. As a leader, you will guide a team of talented PMs, APMs, and Developers, collaborating closely with UI/UX teams/agencies and QA teams to oversee the entire lifecycle of our innovative products. To thrive in this position, you must possess a genuine passion for internet/ web products and a strong desire to make a positive impact on millions of lives. Demonstrating exceptional analytical skills, you will be data-driven, synthesizing consumer insights and interactions to maintain our product edge and enhance market leadership. Your ability to plan, organize, and execute effectively will be crucial in achieving our ambitious growth plans. Being comfortable in cross-functional disciplines like Technology, UI/UX, Market Research, and Communication will undoubtedly propel you forward in this role. The inherent interdependence of product management requires excellent collaboration, negotiation, and influencing skills to align stakeholders, objectives, and roadmaps for timely execution. As this role involves people management, your exceptional ability to connect with and inspire individuals, hire top talent, nurture their growth, and keep them motivated to surpass goals will be essential. Key Responsibilities: Oversee the entire Product Lifecycle, championing the customer and assessing market opportunities to plan, execute, and measure success through relevant KPIs while continually seeking areas for improvement. Define and analyze Key Success Metrics. Lead a team of PMs, APMs, and Developers, collaborating cross-functionally with UI/UX, QA, Central Engineering, and Business Teams (Sales/Servicing/Customer Support) to deliver on aggressive growth plans. Prioritize and sign-off on new feature development, enhancements, and bug fixes. Define execution plans and allocate resources accordingly. Manage the complete development lifecycle, from requirement definition to deployment, while driving insights and continual improvements. Define, document, and communicate objectives, requirements, and constraints for product initiatives and releases. Foster the growth of a high-performance team. Desired Skill Set: 8-15 years of experience in technology and product. Strong analytical abilities and proficiency with various web analytics tools. Excellent problem-solving skills. Proven drive to achieve and bias for action. Collaboration, negotiation, and influencing skills. Proficiency in efficient Scrum and Sprint management. Excellent people management skills. Track record of successfully defining and releasing products in the Internet/ Mobile space Ability to thrive in a fast-paced startup environment. Educational Qualification: 80% and above in classes 10 and 12 B Tech/BE + MBA with 10+ years of experience. Join us in shaping the future of internet products, driving innovation, and making a meaningful difference in millions of lives. Be part of our dynamic team where your skills, passion, and leadership will be recognized and rewarded.

column2: We are looking for a driven, team player as the successful applicant will be assisting the master data managers with tasks to bring product live on our websites and troubleshoot when the situation arises. Therefore, the candidate should know how to problem solve and be solution oriented. Attention to detail is also extremely important because the assets the candidate will be coordinating will be visible to consumers, so accuracy while working as efficiently as possible is key.                      Our goal is to showcase our product the best way possible, whether it is through product images, descriptions or helping consumers navigate through the site. Bringing product to life on the site is an extremely rewarding element in this role as master data is the backbone of our websites.                      Key Responsibilities:                     Assist the Master Data managers to help manage the master data for adidas and drive personalization within the Online shops                 Proactively monitor the product range reports which includes identifying newly ranged product to be set up, changes in launch dates and special product launches that require more effort to launch smoothly online                 Coordinate the production of images, product copy and translations by working with internal departments and local agencies to ensure everything is produced on time for product launches                  Set up the product master data for all sites with speed and accuracy to launch product on time. This involves the creation of filters, pricing, sizes, images and product copy.                 Support the master data managers by enriching the product filters using data sources or thinking outside the box when product information does not exist                  Identify and solve issues with product presentation on the site or within the product systems in a fast and solution oriented manner                 Work in an organized and structured manner that allows for the flexibility to manage adhoc tasks and requests that could range from providing status updates on product launches and online readiness to last minute campaign changes                     Key Relationships:                          Product and Consumer Experience Team                         eCom Partner Program                         Marketing Activation                         DTC Category Managers                         Marketing Business Units and Group Data managements                         Global Asset Creation Team                         Site Operations                         Global IT                         Global Digital Brand Commerce Org (DBC)                             Knowledge, Skills and Abilities       :                          Data driven mindset. If you do not have a passion for data, this role is not for you.                          Excellent time management and organizational skills balancing adhoc requests and regular work is a daily occurrence                         Attention to detail all work performed will be visible to consumers                         Fluent English + local languages where applicable within the cluster. column2: The Product Director will be responsible for driving the end to end Supply based product growth leading two lines of Supply business -  Brands Platform and Factory Platform: Brand Platform  - We work with consumer/regional brands and help build their distribution on bijnis platform connecting lakhs of retail counters and drawing repeat business. Factory Platform  - We work with local factories on non-branded products where we standardize the product quality and offer best prices to the retailers of India. We help factories decide what to manufacture and how much to manufacture and improve their capacity utilization levels. Responsibilities : - You will be leading a team of PMs and drive execution with them. - Work closely with the founders on strategy and planning. - You will be responsible for driving end to end execution and feature prioritization. - Hire for your team as and when needed. - Own the Key Metrics and drive growth on those numbers. - Manage Stakeholders and collaborate with Operations, Warehouse, Demand and Customer Experience. Key Focus Areas: Seller Onboarding & Capacity Identification 1) Ensure the Factory Onboarding process is smooth and gather important information seamlessly without much hassle. Reduce the TAT of factory registration to LIVE on bijnis platform. 2) Go deep inside the manufacturing unit and gather information around category specialization, processes involved and machinery/labor installed. Use this information to build a framework that can identify a running capacity of a Factory Unit. Factory Growth & Consistency 1) Market Trend and Seasonality Analysis: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to build intuitive interfaces for factories, enabling them to align production with market trends and seasonality. Develop tools and dashboards to guide factories in creating production plans for each quarter, ensuring efficient resource allocation. 2) Category System & Repository Management: Lead the identification and development & evolution of a comprehensive category system tailored for the manufacturing sector that helps in capacity identification. 3) Production Planning: Help teams develop a production plan for next Quarter such that Factory Sales consistency is maintained and best prices can be extracted. 4) Pricing Strategies - Build systems that can help leverage best prices from the Supply Chain and be the best priced platform for retailers. Order Management & Seller Experience: 1) Design and implement a robust mechanism for managing purchase orders efficiently. 2) Oversee the development of real-time inventory management solutions to optimize stock levels and reduce operational inefficiencies. 3) Ensure a smooth production experience from manufacturing to Finance. Supporting Sourcing Managers: 1) Build a supportive platform for our in-house team of Sourcing Managers and Relationship Managers. 2) Equip them with tools and insights to effectively collaborate with factories, fostering business growth and long-term relationships. Some Key Metrics: 1) Grow number of factories with consistent growth 2) Factory CSAT Score 3) Improve Operational Metrics - Cancellation, Delays, Returns 4) No. of new designs onboarded Experience: - 6+ years of experience - Prior Experience in Product Development Supply side.
column11: Product Management, IT Product Management, order management, supply chain, product development, purchase, production planning, inventory management, strategic planning

column2: Role & responsibilities     Responsibilities : SPOC for End-End Feature realization pertaining to his/her Domain, 100% Feature coverage Provides commitment for Milestones and sprint releases Tracks progress for Features and User stories planned and escalate any risks, dependencies affecting Milestones Responsible for analyzing and understanding the assigned Customer requirements specification (CRS) and Change requests Sought clarifications of Customer requirements to the various stakeholders (software development teams, Architecture team, program management teams, test/validation teams) effectively to solicit feasibility impact in a timely manner and support Requirement Engineering team to manage all Requirements traceability in DOORs Responsible for interfacing with the customer for clarification of all assigned features and approval from the customer for any deviations from required features as defined in the customer specification Leads the activity of grooming the requirements involves coordinating discussion and commitment with various teams to ensure correct description and acceptance criteria of assigned features. Acts a face to the customer from a technical standpoint representing the engineering teams and CPM for their domain As part of being responsible for delivering a completed, working feature, the Functional Owner will also play a role in managing and facilitating the resolution of defects for their domain by clarifying requirements, coordinating interdomain discussion, and providing direction as set by program managers Demonstrated Experience Well acquainted with the technologies and Features supported  Demonstrate character, clarity, courage and commitment to high-performance Build environment of trust, high performance and engagement by establishing clear goals and a commitment to feedback, development and recognition Champion a better, faster and simpler way of doing things Apply original thinking and continuous improvement to processes, products, systems or services and manage change to better serve customer needs Connect, engage and communicate with others Encourage open expression of ideas; communicate effectively at all levels and build strong relationships Make sound decisions Demonstrate critical thinking to take appropriate risk and make sound and timely decisions Deliver extraordinary results Take initiative to achieve superior, quality results against internal or external standards of excellence Preferred candidate profile     Qualifications and requirements:   10+ years of experience in any of the below (Preference is in the order mentioned) Played as Feature Owner on any of Automotive IVI or Head Unit or Cluster domains Technical architect/lead/Manager in Automotive IVI or Head Unit or Cluster software development & validation experience from OEM  Suzuki, Volvo, Hyundai Technical architect/lead/Manager in Automotive IVI or Head Unit or Cluster software development & validation experience from Tier 1 Technical architect/lead/Manager in Automotive IVI or Head Unit or Cluster software development & validation experience from Tier 2 Technical architect/lead/Manager in Embedded System software development in Linux. Proficiency in real time multi-threaded software design and development, system programming using IPC, synchronization primitives Bachelors or Masters degree in Electronics or Computer science (or equivalent) Programming Language: Strong in C/C++. OS: Linux/Any prominent RTOSes like QNX, Integrity, RT Linux. Proficiency in real time multi-threaded software design and development, system programming using IPC, synchronization primitives Strong technical expertise in Rear View Camera, 360 Camera, City Parking, RCTA (Rear Cross Traffic Alert), DoP, ODS (Obstacle Detection System), Trajectory, and GSRV2 Regulations SPOC for End-End Feature realization pertaining to his/her Domain, 100% Feature coverage Responsible for analyzing and understanding the assigned Customer requirements specification (CRS) and Change requests Responsible to track progress for Features and User stories planned and escalate any risks, dependencies affecting Milestones Responsible for interfacing with the customer for clarification of all assigned features and approval from the customer for any deviations from required features as defined in the customer specification Acts a face to the customer from a technical standpoint  Well acquainted with the technologies and Features supported  Demonstrate character, clarity, courage and commitment to high-performance Connect, engage and communicate with others
